pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick textures from the palette and assign in 3D view

content.raw: One last thing that I noticed, though I don't think it's due to this pull request. When the 2D view is at a low zoom level (far away), the text is very small. Should the text not scale with the zoom level?
content.html: One last thing that I noticed, though I don't think it's due to this pull request. When the 2D view is at a low zoom level (far away), the text is very small. Should the text not scale with the zoom level?
